location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 62: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to His Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil CB, Her Majesty's Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia, Tehran

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell refers to Justin Sheil's letter of 11 January 1850 and states that the HC sloop Clivesailed for the Haffar Canal on 4 February, under the command of Commodore John Patterson Porter.
